casebody.data:
Bank of Hartford, Inc. v. Harriet T. Parker (13229)

Foti, Schaller and Hennessy, Js.

Argued December 2 decision released December 20, 1994 Harriet T. Parker, pro se, the appellant (named defendant). Scott F. Lewis, with whom, on the brief, were Mona E. Hermand and Arthur M. Lewis, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed and the case

is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
